scripts.build:css: mkdir -p public/css && pleeease compile app/css/* to public/css/app.css
scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run build:css
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run watch' 'http-server ./public'
scripts.watch: npm run watch:assets & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:scripts
scripts.watch:scripts: mkdir -p public/js && watchify app/js/app.js -o public/js/app.js -t babelify -t riotify -v true
